title: 500 Milliliters of /vr/
author: 4chan
description: 500 Milliliters of /vr/ is a community add-on by members of the /vr/ board on 4chan released on February 1, 2021. It features six levels created by three authors, and features numerous replaced assets. Four levels are available for Bloodbath. It is named as a play on the 200 Minutes of /vr/ and related community projects for Doom.
